name: catachresis
text: A comment left by catachresis was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by ishuta, NeoNaoNeo, VictoriaW, Darthemed)

name: deimosrising
text: There are times we are not in agreement catachresis, but this is not one of them.

name: jamers
text: Ray was only looking out for Pat's self-interest...

name: zefiel
text: Wearing a cape is SO bad that Ray will even care enough for Pat to tell him not to do it.

name: perhapsmaybe
text: I agree much, this whole nice pat arch is one of my favs

name: slalvation
text: That is what I told my friend on the phone when I read that panel. I hadn't read any of the others yet but I told her.

name: luckypyjamas
text:
and pat is so happy to hear him say this

it makes for an excellent segue into his new mission in life

name: drago25
text: My sentiments exactly. chubby.

name: aliiis
text: Yes and also the shock lines around his head when he spots the faux pas. Just looking out of the window, checking to make sure nobody's wearing a cape... I feel that sadly this strip goes downhill after the first two panels, not because the others are bad, but simply because those two are just so absolutely god damn perfect.

name: agika
text: I bet Ray held the "contemplative Ray pose" all the way from his house window to his recording studio window.

name: slab64
text: I love that pose!

name: apocowarg
text: Pausing only to switch arms.

name: gigs
text: No, that's still his left arm(at least, it seems that way to me). He just switched which way he's facing the 'camera'.

name: chaesar
text:
Ladies and Gentlemen, I present:
"Pat's license plate"

----------------------
| California |
| RENFAIR |
| The Golden State |
----------------------

hella-emotional

name: chaesar
text: ah goddamn comment board script, erasing extra spaces, ruining my art

name: nbgreene
text: yes, but think about the anarchy that would ensue if we could do spaces!

name: tellumo
text:
You inspired me to fire up the old License Plate Maker and make such a plate. Behold!

[IMGS OFF]

name: charchar
text: I would get so mad rutty in a car with that licence plate. Maybe even second base...

name: rowboat
text: That's probably just as well. Based on the few people I've known who may be inclined to buy such a plate, I'd have to assume that he would be curled into a ball on the floorboard and sobbing before you could get anywhere near third base. That is, unless you were dressed as Arwen Evenstar. But in that case, it'd probably be over way too soon, anyway.

name: charchar
text:
I'm leaning more towards Galadriel...mainly because I want reason to yell " All shall love me and despair! "

Samus Aran would also be pretty sweet.

name: mattylite
text: I'LL BE THE FIRST TO ADMIT...I HAVE A HUGE CRUSH ON LIVE TYLER

name: charchar
text: As do we all.

name: mattylite
text: I'm assuming you, just as I, meant LIV tyler.  Live Tyler, I think, is gonna be the title of the album Steven Tyler puts out in 2031, after the rest of Aerosmith is dead.  Despite a cover of "Sweet Emotion" using synthesizers made out of substances that don't yet exist, I don't imagine I will have a huge crush on Live Tyler.  No, I don't imagine so at all.

name: charchar
text: Well, there's always dead Tyler.  Not my thing but you know, I'm not here to judge.

name: fineoakstructure
text: [wonder showzen] Tyyyyler! [/wonder showzen]

name: scorpio_nadir
text:
It is this court's opinion that this is a great site to waste time on. So Chubbied!

[IMGS OFF]

name: centipede_damascus
text: Pat writes songs about injustice, like how he doesn't get to park in handicapped spaces even though everyone knows he has a bum knee.

name: never_die
text: i would listen to Pat Reynolds.

name: epicurus
text: I once knew a dude who wore a cape. A lot of our interations could be summed up by the first three panels minus the bunny and with more cheetos.

name: samorama
text: I had a dream this morning that I was getting married but instead of a dress I wore part of a tuxedo, a long skirt and a cape. I kept delaying the wedding for some reason. Could this have been inspired by the latest arc?

name: nutmeg
text: A comment left by nutmeg was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by chivalress, rowboat, catgrl131)

name: factorial
text: Pet rabbit. 5.

name: epicurus
text: A lot of people need for panel 2 to happen to them.

name: tekende
text: Like Superman.

name: echidnaboy
text:
There are three types of people who can get away with wearing a cape. If you either:
a) have a throne
b) can fly
c) are Rick Wakeman
you can get away with it. For everyone else, capes are probably a no-no.

name: phthoggos
text: Rick Wakeman is actually all 3

name: charchar
text: I have a cape; it is purple and spakly and matches my wand.  These were seperate gifts from seperate people.  I fear I may have become predictable.

name: phthoggos
text: [IMGS OFF]

name: dejavroom
text: that is a nice... cape.

name: solobuttons
text: d) Frank Costanza's Lawyer

name: dasilodavi
text: See, THIS is more like it.  Though honestly, I think it would be even funnier if the whole strip was just the first two panels.

name: gopacapulco
text: haha david crosby

name: atmus
text: Ray looks scared in pannel 4.  Scared of a world where Pat isn't a dick.  If that happens, then Roast beef will be the new Ray, and Ray will be forced to be Roast Beef.

name: edwell
text: "Nice Pat" has a certain ring to it.

name: greenkoolayd
text: nice pat and nice pete.

name: jmmfgd
text: it's a good thing to listen to "peace train" while reading this strip. it ain't the byrds, but  it endorses their messages of love and respect

name: kickstart
text:
Yesterday I was in the kitchen making Jello and my dad was clicking through the channels on the satellite. Suddenly, I heard the voice of Tim Gunn.
"Dad! Don't watch Project Runway!"

name: biznart
text: Pat doesn't even argue Ray's assertion that (prior to the electrocution of his dick) he was the biggest asshole Ray knows.

name: carlyle
text: Did Pat bring Hollandaise into the recording studio, or is Ray looking out for him in the other room.

name: kingcrimson
text: It is awesome how in the last panel, Pat is writing music against greed, which is being greedily exploited by Ray. How true to life.

name: art-vader
text: Pat´s mission is to spread niceness through the world. It stands to reason you can only achieve this with a costume including a cape. How else would you do it?

name: mashisoyo
text: Highly melodic folk rock is long overdue for a come-back.
